actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide that the U.S. Canal Zone shall be represented by a Delegate to the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Provides that the United States Canal Zone shall be represented by a Delegate to the House of Representatives. Requires that a special election be held no later than 30 days after enactment of this Act to elect a Delegate to serve until the regular election of 1978.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the U.S. Canal Zone shall be represented by a Delegate to the House of Representatives.
